title: Escape From Paradise 2 - A Kingdom's Quest with Strategy Guide
description:
Escape From Paradise 2 A Kingdom's Quest 



Help your custom hero marry their true love by becoming the chief of the tribe! Collect wood, 

food and build shelters as you attempt to survive. Add more members to your tribe as your village 

grows. Play addicting mini-games and complete challenges to advance, and explore more and more 

islands in this fun sequel to the hit Simulation game, Escape from Paradise. Can you create a 

successful functioning society and land the hand of your soul mate? 


System Requirements:

    * OS: Windows XP/Vista
    * CPU: 600 Mhz
    * RAM: 128 MB
    * DirectX: 6.0
    * Hard Drive: 122 MB
